front.title: Interface Stack Table Definition for Point to Point (P2P) Interface over LAN

abstract.t: In [RFC5309] defines the P2P circuit type is one of the mainly used circuit types in link state routing protocol, and highlights it is important to identify the correct circuit type when forming adjacencies, flooding link state database packets, and monitor the link state. P2P Interface over LAN ifType value is assigned by IANA experts review. This document provides an example of the ifStack for P2P Interface over LAN ifType to facilitate operational control, maintenance and statistics.
